bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: user list ranking is not a-z, z-a.
bug.description: I'm using the IT deployment (PAI 0.8.2). When click ranking by user, user Jianxun is ranked before user admin. I can share the server access IP if it can not be reproduced in other deployment. requirement: case insensitive ranking.

comments.comment: "J" does rank before "a" in ascii order, "A-Z" ranks before "a-z".

Due to new job-list page uses localeCompare for ordering, this issue has been resolved. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2500247/55206913-23345800-5213-11e9-9953-de51ec8d4b17.png></denchmark-link>
